Text.Value: What did the cult want in the vaults?
Where can I find Orin?
Leave.
City... under... city...

EditorData.logicalname: DOESN'T KNOW ANSWER - DELETE IF NOT NEEDED

Text.Value: Minsc... is dead... Stone Lord... lives...
What do you mean 'below'?
What does the cult want with Minsc?
She... will find you...
Where can I find the Stone Lord?
Why do you follow the Stone Lord?
Debt... for deaths... hahaha...
Death's Head... devotee of Bhaal...
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
Shape... changer... doppel... ganger...
*The corpse regards you lifelessly.*
Who was that, wearing my face?
Who are you?
Bringer of death... know... to our master...
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
Look out... below...
*The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*
Who was that wearing Jaheira's face?

Synopsis: SwD with a Minsc follower cultist that players fight after the heist scene
